p: CDV infections have been also reported in members of the genus Lynx including the highly endangered Iberian lynx ( Lynx pardinus) [109], the Eurasian lynx ( Lynx lynx) [14], the Canadian lynx ( Lynx canadensis) [110], and bobcats ( Lynx rufus) [110]. CDV was reported as the etiological agent of encephalitis in a Canadian lynx [110].
